x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.name: AI-based Early Health Risk Detector for Rural Communities
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.short_description: Predicts health risks early using AI to assist rural healthcare workers.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.description: A detailed explanation of your idea: - Problem it solves: Rural communities often lack access to timely medical diagnosis and preventive healthcare. This tool helps identify potential health risks early based on basic inputs. - How it helps people: Supports rural health workers and clinics by providing early alerts for conditions like diabetes, hypertension, or infectious diseases, improving early intervention and healthcare outcomes. - Tech stack you would use: ServiceNow for workflow and record management, AI/ML models (Python, TensorFlow), REST APIs, mobile-friendly dashboards for health workers.
